segments.text: Welcome to our shop . It seems you are interested in this dress .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But I am afraid it is too thick to wear in summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's no problem . It is made of linen , so you won't feel hot in it . I can assure you it is of superior quality . What is more , it is very popular with young women .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , that is reasonable . I will take it .
segments.speaker: S2
